"}],"name":"FHERC20UnauthorizedSpender","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"euint64","name":"value","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"owner","type":"address"}],"name":"FHERC20UnauthorizedUseOfEncryptedAmount","type":"error"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Standard FHERC-20 Errors Interface of the https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6093[ERC-6093] custom errors for ERC-20 tokens.","errors":{"ERC20InsufficientAllowance(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `spender`\u2019s `allowance`. Used in transfers.","params":{"allowance":"Amount of tokens a `spender` is allowed to operate with.","needed":"Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.","spender":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"ERC20InsufficientBalance(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"balance":"Current balance for the interacting account.","needed":"Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.","sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC20InvalidApprover(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"approver":"Address initiating an approval operation."}}],"ERC20InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.","params":{"receiver":"Address to which tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC20InvalidSender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC20InvalidSpender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `spender` to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"spender":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"FHERC20ConfidentialTransferFromOwnerMismatch(address,address)":[{"details":"ConfidentialTransferFrom `from` and `permit.owner` don't match","params":{"from":"ConfidentialTransferFrom param.","permitOwner":"token owner included in FHERC20_EIP712_Permit struct."}}],"FHERC20ConfidentialTransferFromSpenderMismatch(address,address)":[{"details":"ConfidentialTransferFrom `to` and `permit.spender` don't match","params":{"permitSpender":"token receiver included in FHERC20_EIP712_Permit struct.","to":"ConfidentialTransferFrom param."}}],"FHERC20ConfidentialTransferFromValueHashMismatch(uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"ConfidentialTransferFrom `value` greater than `permit.value_hash` dont match (permit doesn't match Euint64)","params":{"inValueHash":"ConfidentialTransferFrom param inValue.ctHash.","permitValueHash":"token amount hash included in FHERC20_EIP712_Permit struct."}}],"FHERC20IncompatibleFunction()":[{"details":"Indicates an incompatible function being called. Prevents unintentional treatment of an FHERC20 as a cleartext ERC20"}],"FHERC20InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"The given receiver `receiver` is invalid for transfers."}],"FHERC20UnauthorizedSpender(address,address)":[{"details":"ConfidentialTransferFrom `from` and `permit.owner` don't match","params":{"from":"ConfidentialTransferFrom param.","spender":"operator authorized to spent tokens from."}}],"FHERC20UnauthorizedUseOfEncryptedAmount(uint256,address)":[{"details":"The caller `owner` does not have access to the encrypted value `value`."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/interfaces/IFHERC20Errors.sol":"IFHERC20Errors"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@luxfi/contracts/=node_modules/@luxfi/contracts/",":@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/",":@openzeppelin/contracts/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/",":hardhat-deploy/=node_modules/hardhat-deploy/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"]},"sources":{"contracts/interfaces/IFHERC20Errors.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdc913f426c7a7bd670dd4cd679f2a237009f2e2449685a8011ffb33c850fb8ef","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://aec51bbce38cd7335901334c6ece4153cce5c34cd9b9756d0009eca81d465371","dweb:/ipfs/QmWHvKbj3ijoJq39R13fiZuAniTEuQh1oRL4XqfBp43eWW"]},"node_modules/@luxfi/contracts/fhe/FHE.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa23998a8d39f62962df308163685e1efd5120e2204b74e20188e6144123d5424","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c031db6aa4df5d66a45f07a789eece0675d8c8ecf87f34cdf6f1641cd750a6e9","dweb:/ipfs/QmWJvZjkPAo8VrPpFQGCvvt4yqiX3tRLBFteYHj2qMtTqn"]},"node_modules/@luxfi/contracts/fhe/FHECommon.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb6e8e21a662629948f1b7ed86b847876f2f91059f35747a704a3ef0cd8d29c01","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d76a878fa2af0597bdd79c85eb13736c6cc31137cb3da5f70d2512dc29b61d37","dweb:/ipfs/QmXaaPiZkcDbZhqoW87mXuHgsvuXZfwxkrx48WMUBjhVFY"]},"node_modules/@luxfi/contracts/fhe/FHENetwork.sol":{"keccak256":"0x942a1bdad358f6e410e9713069e03876ee17434ae262fc725d6ccc978fdff337","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://888d85d302d90b4b0ad8ca529c27b0fec8aabcb46aedc4b314bc506a1b80682f","dweb:/ipfs/QmTMWn1dF96KxZyNrpDUFDjafFqN2x9eDhcSpAWUqJhwbF"]},"node_modules/@luxfi/contracts/fhe/FHETypes.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc011b88033bd7ea040641926afd5a6df60180bb180d5fd46f835f127223cd445","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://838082044b5750417ba392770fd03b22c1709db6
